name: Library of Borges
description: "The Library is a sphere whose exact center is any one of its hexagons and whose circumference is inaccessible" Sounds a bit like a decentralised network, a blockchain network, doesn't it? Someone I spoke with on Twitter, @JonotrainEB, actually *built* a Library of Babel, inspired by the Borges book, website: https://libraryofbabel.info/ This work is inspired by the Borges book, the making of the idea a reality, and the realities now possible because of many great blockchain projects.
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
